headline.main: NAZIS HINT AT 'STAGING'; Comment on Kearny and Add Attack on Roosevelt and Knox

lead_paragraph: After twenty-four hours of withholding comment on the torpedoing of the United States destroyer Kearny, Germany denied yesterday in a Berlin radio broadcast that a Nazi submarine had been responsible, and sought to insinuate that the blast was "staged" to help bring about modification of the Neutrality Act.
abstract: Berlin radio charges destroyer Kearny attack was staged to force legis; attacks Roosevelt, Knox and Brit Min Campbell
